translations: int．天哪，哎呀：用于表示惊讶、恼怒或烦恼。
· Egads! I forgot my wallet at home.
天哪！我把钱包忘在家里了。

sentences.sentence: Can I really tell my snobby friends that I now shop at-egads-Walmart?
sentences.translation: 天呐，我真得好意思告诉那帮势利的朋友们我在沃尔玛买东西？

sentences.sentence: Notes: this is not a transcript. No recording devices were allowed at the meeting, so this is based on many hours of rapid typing, combined with my memory egads!
sentences.translation: 请注意：这并非正式记录，因为现场不准携带录音设备，所凭藉的是快速的打字以及个人的记忆天啊！
